index.title: Learn how to survive in the Finnish job market.
index.description: Earner is the best resource for pointing out how to survivie in the Finnish job market. We highlight government support for the unemployed, startup grants for entrepreneurs, and discuss employment contracts for the employed.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Follow the Earner blog to learn about new product features, company news, and employment stories like yours

employed.title: For Employees
employed.description: Learn your rights as an employee in Finland. Here you will learn about how to collect unpaid salary, employment contracts,labor unions, and more.
